text:
How to go viral on LinkedIn in 5 minutes.

Here’s the exact method (4 steps):

1. Find viral LinkedIn posts fast  

Go to easygen. io  
Search for posts with a high outlier index  
Copy the image from a top viral post  
Find a strong quote from another viral post

2. Mix images and quotes  

Open gemini .google .com  
Paste the image with your quote
Prompt template: "Change the book quote with this one: [quote]"

3. Repurpose your post caption  

Go back to EasyGen  
Click "Repurpose" on the viral post  
Add a new Topic (think of it like a prompt) 
Keep generating until you get a post you love

4. Post and watch it go viral

Upload your new image with the new quote  
Copy and paste your new caption from EasyGen  
Hit post and engage with the comments you'll receive.

You use proven viral content.  
You remix it with AI.  
You post with confidence.

Go viral, again and again.
